# AI Agents for CFOs' teams
Word Change Animation
### Finnt automates bank reconciliations
Automate your **accounting & controllership** **reporting** with secure, compliant, and**AI-powered workflows.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/67536d385952969f04dec1cc_Corporate%20Finance%20\(9\).png)
plans
Get Started
plans
## Streamline your finance procedures
Automate manual data entry, reconciliation, and financial workflows with Finnt. Book revenue faster, detect discrepancies instantly, and generate journals in seconds. Your finance team can focus on what matters.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/6751fe59fe773d1350ad0a10_grid-5.svg)
Plug and Play
Keep your ERP and spreadsheets, Finnt fits seamlessly into the tools your team already relies on.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/6751fe59fe773d1350ad0a33_profile-2user.svg)
You are in control
When executing procedures, Finnt agents will ask you for approval, reviews and confirmation. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/6751fe59fe773d1350ad0a32_health.svg)
No disruption
Finnt keeps your processes intact while enhancing them with AI-powered automation and insights.
[Schedule a Demo](https://finnt.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/anji-ismail/finnt-onboarding>)
plans
Get Started
plans
## AI for Finance Teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/67535ad7b64216c46e2b3f15_Corporate%20Finance%20\(4\).png)
## Noise into reports
Finnt transforms your invoices, contracts, PO, spreadsheets etc. into structured reports. Finnt agents prepare your journals, do your variance analysis and reconciliations so you can focus on decision-making.
[See Finnt in Action](https://finnt.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/anji-ismail/finnt-onboarding>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/67535bc5373a2d0673155840_Corporate%20Finance%20\(6\).png)
## Ready to go
Finnt seamlessly integrates with your existing financial workflows, automating complex processes while preserving control and compliance. Our AI agents identify discrepancies, flag exceptions, and ensure accuracy at scale.

## Secure & Private
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/6751fe59fe773d1350ad0988_shield-check.svg)
Secure all the way
Your data security is our main priority, we apply the best practices at all levels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/67534dd5c3a991effee85b46_SOC_CPA_Black%20\(1\)%201.png)

We never use your organization's data to train LLMs or share it with external AI tools.

## Frequently Asked Questions
For any unanswered questions, [feel free to reach out to us](https://finnt.com/</contact>) and we'll answer as soon as possible.
What types of accounting tasks can Finnt automate?
Finnt automates repetitive and time-consuming tasks like financial reporting, account reconciliations, and variance analysis. It also simplifies processes like journal entries, month-end close workflows, and data consolidation.
How does Finnt assist with financial reporting?
Finnt automatically gathers and consolidates data from multiple systems, validates the numbers, and generates reports that are accurate and ready for review. It ensures compliance with accounting standards and reduces the time spent on manual preparation.
How does Finnt handle data accuracy?
Finnt cross-checks and validates data from different systems, flagging anomalies or inconsistencies for review. This helps ensure that all financial information is reliable and reduces the risk of errors.
What workflows are best suited for Finnt?
Finnt is ideal for workflows like recurring reconciliations, financial statement preparation, compliance monitoring, and any repetitive task that involves data entry or consolidation. It enhances efficiency while leaving room for accountants to focus on high-value tasks.
What formats can Finnt handle?
Finnt is built to handle a wide range of formats commonly used in corporate finance. This includes Excel spreadsheets, CSV files, PDFs, and data exported from ERP systems like SAP, Oracle, and NetSuite. It also integrates with financial databases and supports structured and unstructured data, making it easy to process and consolidate information from diverse sources.
**Can Finnt handle large companies?**
Absolutely. Finnt is designed to support the complex needs of medium and large enterprises, processing high volumes of financial data across multiple entities, systems, and currencies. Whether it’s consolidating data from global subsidiaries or managing large transaction datasets, Finnt ensures scalability, speed, and accuracy without compromising performance.
**Is Finnt Magic?**
No! Finnt has been developed hand-in-hand with finance professionals to ensure it fits seamlessly into their workflows. Every feature is purpose-built to address real-world challenges, automate repetitive tasks, and provide actionable insights, so your team can focus on high-value work. It’s not magic but we hope it feels this magical.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6751fe59fe773d1350ad02d7/675200e2671d3e6d8122cde6_Logo_long_Blancx2.png)](https://finnt.com/</>)
Don't waste your finance teams on repetitive and manual tasks. Let AI do the work.

generated_description:
**Finnt: Revolutionizing Finance Through AI**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Miami, FL, Finnt is on a mission to transform corporate finance. With a dedicated team of five, this innovative company leverages AI to create agents designed specifically for CFOs and finance teams, streamlining processes across financial planning & analysis (FP&A), controllership, accounting, and tax.

Part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Finnt is not just another startup; it’s setting a new standard in financial operations. Their platform automates tasks like bank reconciliations, journal entries, and financial reporting—essentially taking the manual grunt work out of finance. This means teams can focus on higher-value tasks that truly drive decision-making and strategy.

Finnt’s technology integrates seamlessly with existing tools—think ERP systems and spreadsheets—ensuring that teams won’t need to overhaul their entire workflow to benefit from advanced automation. Instead, it enhances what’s already in place, making finance operations smoother and more efficient. Imagine booking revenue faster, spotting discrepancies in real-time, and instantly generating reports. That’s the world Finnt is creating.

Data privacy is paramount: Finnt does not share or use your company's financial data for training AI models, ensuring your information remains secure. The company's AI agents maintain compliance while providing powerful insights that help identify cash-saving opportunities and detect bad debt risks.

With backing from notable investors, Finnt stands at the forefront of the B2B financial technology landscape, carving a niche in workflow automation for enterprise software. Their approach blends the reliability of structured financial processes with the agility of AI, proving that finance doesn’t have to be bogged down by time-consuming tasks.

If you’re looking to enhance your financial operations and free your team from repetitive duties, Finnt might just be the solution you didn’t know you needed. Check them out at [Finnt.com](https://finnt.com).
